summary: Two bugs found in EncodedValues: incorrect null value decoding and incorrect named argument encoding in workflows.
userImpact: Users building workflow tests encounter incorrect behavior when using null values or named arguments in activities.
rootCause: EncodedValues implementation has bugs in null decoding logic and named argument encoding for PHP syntax.
proposedFix: PR with fixes was planned by the reporter.
resolutionDetails: Bugs were fixed as indicated by the closed status and reporter's intent to create a PR.
keyQuote: noticed two small bugs: wrong decoding of `null` values, wrong encoding of named arguments
